rules.specification: class with function with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.messaging.Incoming" must have annotation "javax.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped" or annotation "javax.enterprise.context.Dependent"

class with function with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.messaging.Outgoing" must have annotation "javax.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped" or annotation "javax.enterprise.context.Dependent"
field with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.jwt.Claim" must have annotation "javax.inject.Inject"
class with function with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.graphql.Query" must have annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.graphql.GraphQLApi"
field with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.config.inject.ConfigProperty" must have annotation "javax.inject.Inject"
